API¶

icon¶

django_icons.icon(name, *args, **kwargs)¶

Render an icon

Parameters:

name

The name of the icon to be rendered

title

The title attribute for the icon

default

None (no title attribute rendered)

renderer

The renderer to use for the icon

default

The default renderer as per settings.py, or ultimately FontAwesomeRenderer.

Usage:

icon(name)

Example:

icon('pencil')
icon('trash', title='Delete')
